peril.views.slick.components.menus

Class HelpMenu.HelpPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.views.slick.components.menus.HelpMenu.HelpPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component
    Enclosing class:
    HelpMenu

    private final class HelpMenu.HelpPage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Component
    A page on the HelpMenu that links to a next and previous HelpMenu.HelpPage. Also wraps TextField allowing for pre-initialisation text addition.
    Version:
    1.01.02
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    Component

    • Field Summary

      int next
      The uniquely identifying ID number of the next HelpMenu.HelpPage.
      int previous
      The uniquely identifying ID number of the previous HelpMenu.HelpPage.
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> temp
      Holds the lines of text that have been give to this HelpMenu before this HelpMenu has be initialised using HelpMenu.init().
      private TextField text
      The TextField that will display the text to the user.
      java.lang.String title
      The string title of this HelpMenu.HelpPage.

      • text

        private final TextField text
        The TextField that will display the text to the user.

      • temp

        private final java.util.List<java.lang.String> temp
        Holds the lines of text that have been give to this HelpMenu before this HelpMenu has be initialised using HelpMenu.init(). When this HelpMenu is initialised all the elements of this List will be added to the TextField.

    • Constructor Detail

                int next,
                int previous,
                java.lang.String title)

        Parameters:
